source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace(replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) >= 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace(replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],

	[AutoPDASO],

select a.* from [dbo].[sales_shipment_header] a left join [dbo].[watermarkssh] b on a.Site_Code = b.Site_Code 
where a.[Last Modified On] > b.Last_Modified_On

activities.name: get_all_files_lastmodified
activities.description: get all files lastmodified and use latest file to dump in a temp csv filr.
